column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Michael - Thank you for your 5-star review. I appreciate your thorough review
column2: and I'm glad we have met your satisfaction. It is true
column3: when the house fills up and folks are waiting inside (and outside)
column4: we try to move things along WITHOUT making any of our customers feel rushed -- it's never easy. But we do the best that we can
column5: and we work hard to keep folks satisfied.
